title: Lea Michele accentuates her slim waist in a Victorian-inspired gown at the 2019 amfAR Gala
text:
She was surely one of the best-dressed stars of the night.

And on Thursday, Lea Michele made a dazzling appearance at the annual amfAR Gala at Milk Studios in Los Angeles.

The event was set to raise money for the foundation, which raises money for AIDS research.

Lea Michele, 33, made a dazzling appearance at the annual amfAR Gala at Milk Studios in Los Angeles on Thursday

Lea, styled by go-to stylist Brad Goreski, looked timeless in a Victorian-inspired gown, which accentuated her small waist.

The dress featured a voluminous bottom and velvet straps.

Laura Polko styled the star's hair in a sleek bun, while make-up artist Denise Madrigal opted for a bold, maroon lip.

Vintage-inspired: Lea, styled by go-to stylist Brad Goreski, looked timeless in a Victorian-inspired gown, which accentuated her small waist

So beautiful: The dress featured a voluminous bottom and velvet straps

Charity night: The event was set to raise money for the foundation, which raises money for AIDS research

Lea became a star at a young age, having landed Broadway roles while in her teens.

The actress rose to international fame in 2009 when she starred as Rachel Berry in the Fox hit, Glee.

The New York native's talents were center stage on the show, as her character had both Broadway dreams and a Broadway voice to match.

New pals: Kathryn Newton and Victoria Justice were seated around Lea inside the venue

Pretty woman: 'Loving this @amfar look! ❤️,' wrote Lea, as she shared a profile of herself

Where it truly shines: The star's Reem Acra gown looked even more beautiful in natural light

The star has produced two albums since 2014; Louder and Places.

Lea is currently promoting her Christmas album, Christmas in the City, and teased her first single in an Instagram post last week.

The recently-married beauty has also shot the music video for her first single, The Most Wonderful Time of the Year.
description: She was surely one of the best-dressed stars of the night. And on Thursday, Lea Michele made a dazzling appearance at the annual amfAR Gala at Milk Studios in Los Angeles.
